docs.snippet: SILLS--Ruth. July 24, 2016. Beloved wife of the late Irving, devoted mother of Robert (Carol Schwartz), Nancy (Franklin Moss) and of Judy, who predeceased her. Adoring and adored grandmother of Josh, Matt, Hannah, Becky and Joanna, and great-grand...
docs.lead_paragraph:
SILLS--Ruth.

July 24, 2016. Beloved wife of the late Irving, devoted mother of Robert (Carol Schwartz), Nancy (Franklin Moss) and of Judy, who predeceased her. Adoring and adored grandmother of Josh, Matt, Hannah, Becky and Joanna, and great-grand mother of Jackson, Harlow and Kendra. Services at the Plaza Jewish Community Chapel, 91st and Amsterdam, on Thursday, July 28 at noon.

docs.snippet: SCHOOLFIELD--George. George C. Schoolfield, 90, Professor Emeritus Yale University, passed away surrounded by his loving family on July 21, 2016. Survived by his beloved wife Gloria Della Selva Schoolfield, daughters Susan Schoolfield (Tony) and M...
docs.lead_paragraph:
SCHOOLFIELD--George. George C. Schoolfield, 90, Professor Emeritus Yale University, passed away surrounded by his loving family on July 21, 2016. Survived by his beloved wife Gloria Della Selva Schoolfield, daughters Susan Schoolfield (Tony) and Marguerite Compton. Also survived by several grandchildren and nieces and nephews. Friends are invited to meet directly at First Presbyterian Church, 704 Whitney Ave. New Haven, CT at 11 am, July 26, 2016 for a funeral service honoring George's life. Interment to follow in St. Mary's Cemetery, Hamden, CT. In lieu of flowers, donations in his name may be sent to the National MS Society, P.O. Box 4527 New York, NY 10163. To see full obituary, please visit www.beecher

andbennett.com.

docs.snippet: BROWN--Daniel J. Dan Brown, age 97. July 6, 1919 - July 21, 2016. Beloved husband of the late Norma (Selikoff), and later in life, the late Sybil (Hertzman). Loving father to Ronnie (Jonathan) Halpern, Judie (Harold) Bregman, and Nancy (Rick) Naso...
docs.lead_paragraph:
BROWN--Daniel J.

Dan Brown, age 97. July 6, 1919 - July 21, 2016. Beloved husband of the late Norma (Selikoff), and later in life, the late Sybil (Hertzman). Loving father to Ronnie (Jonathan) Halpern, Judie (Harold) Bregman, and Nancy (Rick) Nasoff, and stepfather to Karen (Jerry) Biderman. Adored grandfather of Stephanie (Stuart) Rodnick, Jaclyn (Craig) Bonder, Lisa and Evan (Linnea) Bregman, Lauren (Mitch) Bloom, and Jodi Nasoff. And step-grandfather to Noel (Amanda) Biderman and Sandor (Shonna) Biderman. "Poppy" was great-grandfather to Justin and Jared Rodnick, Ethan and Jordan Bonder, Max Bloom, Abel, Soren, Sasha, Ryan and Romy Biderman. Dan was the "maven" of the family-with limitless knowledge about just about everything, and always willing to share it with all who would listen. Mr. Fix-It, Master Story-Teller, WWII Army Veteran, Turkey Carver, and Fisherman--He will never be forgotten. Service Monday, July 25 at Boulevard Chapel, Hewlett, NY. Donations may be made to the organization of your choice.

docs.snippet: ROSEN--Annette. March 21, 1925 - July 22, 2016. A life-long New Yorker, Annette was active in many civic organizations, most fondly, the Women's City Club of New York. Annette was the daughter of Samuel and Molly (Weisbrod) Young. Annette is survi...
docs.lead_paragraph: ROSEN--Annette. March 21, 1925 - July 22, 2016. A life-long New Yorker, Annette was active in many civic organizations, most fondly, the Women's City Club of New York. Annette was the daughter of Samuel and Molly (Weisbrod) Young. Annette is survived by Richard, her beloved husband of almost 60 years; her sons Michael (Susan) and Andrew (Brandi Beck); and grandchildren, Matthew, Sam and Charlie Rosen and Dasha Fowler. She was preceded in death by her brother, Paul, and her beloved granddaughter Elizabeth Hannah Rosen. A memorial service is being planned. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made in Annette's memory to the Alzheimer's Foundation of America.

docs.snippet: COHEN--Frances Milgrim, peacefully, on July 22, 2016 in Scottsdale Arizona. Loving wife of the late Seymour, devoted mother of Nancy, cherished sister of the late Jean Dranoff, dear aunt of Steve. Fran was adored by her "Four Legged Fur Children,"...
docs.lead_paragraph:
COHEN--Frances Milgrim,

peacefully, on July 22, 2016 in Scottsdale Arizona. Loving wife of the late Seymour, devoted mother of Nancy, cherished sister of the late Jean Dranoff, dear aunt of Steve. Fran was adored by her "Four Legged Fur Children," Sophie and Jackson. Her loving nature, impeccable style and fashionista sense will be missed. Service Wednesday, July 27, 12 noon at "The Riverside," 76 St. at Amsterdam Ave. Donations in her memory may be made to: azrescue.org or Stroke Association.

docs.snippet: REICH--Seymour: The Board of Trustees, residents and staff of the Hebrew Home at Riverdale mourn the loss of Seymour Reich who was a dedicated and thoughtful trustee for many years. Seymour was a giant in the Jewish community and we will miss his ...
docs.lead_paragraph:
REICH--Seymour:

The Board of Trustees, residents and staff of the Hebrew Home at Riverdale mourn the loss of Seymour Reich who was a dedicated and thoughtful trustee for many years. Seymour was a giant in the Jewish community and we will miss his good counsel and friendship. The Hebrew Home at Riverdale by RiverSpring Health Jeffrey S. Maurer, Chairman Daniel Reingold, President and CEO
